title: Gone with the Bustling World - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Death of Loved Ones   Disabilities   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Schemes And Conspiracies
author: 沧海遗墨
description:
He, with shocking talent, but unable to walk, was called Childe Wushuang (Lit. the Unparalleled).

He, conferred a dukedom in youth, won numerous battles to conquer the world and eventually stepped onto the nine-story pagoda as an emperor.

He, flawless and noble for all his life, truly enjoyed a world-wide reputation.

He, possessing the whole picturesque world, was willing to abandon and turn away from it for him.

The peach branch was a token; the red scarf witnessed their affection; and the red thread tied up their hair…

The unexpected encounter under the peach tree sealed a thousand-year legend.

This love couldn’t be found in the highest of heavens or the lowest of netherworld…>
